oai_dc:dc.dc:description: !naxane Karu did not speak of |xue at night, but only in the daytime. When Karu told !nanni (during the day) about the doings of |xue, !nanni was afraid of |xue and cried. Karu put into a dish and !nanni stopped crying and sat down to eat it.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Karu on |xue
